# David Shiloach - Tech & Strategy Blog

Welcome to the official blog of David Shiloach. This site explores the intersection of Artificial Intelligence, User Experience (UX), and Business Strategy.

## Site Summary
- **Author**: David Shiloach (Tech & Strategy Expert)
- **Main Topics**: AI, AGI, UX Design, Digital Transformation, Strategy
- **Language**: Hebrew (Primary)

## Key Articles

### AI & Future Tech
- **Title**: האם ה-AGI כבר כאן? ניתוח מצב (Is AGI Already Here?)
- **Summary**: Analysis of recent GPT-6 and Gemini Ultra 2.0 models and the path to Artificial General Intelligence.
- **URL**: https://david-shiloach-blog.vercel.app/blog/agi-revolution-2026

### UX Design
- **Title**: מיקרו-קופי: המילים שעושות את ההבדל (Micro-copy: The Words That Make the Difference)
- **Summary**: How small text changes in UI can impact conversion rates by tens of percent.
- **URL**: https://david-shiloach-blog.vercel.app/blog/micro-copy-ux-design

### Strategy
- **Title**: טרנספורמציה דיגיטלית בארגוני ענק (Digital Transformation in Enterprises)
- **Summary**: Why most transformation projects fail and the 3 pillars of success.
- **URL**: https://david-shiloach-blog.vercel.app/blog/digital-transformation-enterprise

## About
David Shiloach helps organizations crack their next challenge through digital innovation, data-driven strategy, and advanced UX design.

## Connect
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/david-shiloach/
